alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hooker; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cherry, eastern Grant and northwestern Hooker Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 554 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Hyannis, or 18 miles north of Arthur, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hyannis, Whitman, Carr Lake, Duluth, Hire, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Pratt Lake, Spring Valley Lake, Cogill Lake, Hecla and Weir. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 144 and 174. Highway 61 between mile markers 149 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
